{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07036v1", "title": "Hegedus' Conjecture and Tighter Upper Bounds for Equidistant Codes in
  Hamming Spaces", "summary": "An equidistant code is a code in the Hamming space such that two distinct
codewords have the same Hamming distance. This paper investigates the bounds
for equidistant codes in Hamming spaces.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-04-09T16:52:33Z"}
